screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google search interface with the search term "news this" entered. Below the search bar, there is a sponsored ad for a "Breaking News" app, prompting the user to install it. The navigation tabs include options for "All," "News," "Videos," and "Images." At the bottom, there are quick access icons for "Discover," "Search," and "Collections."
history_actions: click on the Google app icon located at the left and lower part of the screen.
type in the content: " news this evening"
click on the search suggestion "news this evening today" located at the bottom
action_plan: Scroll down to check if there are relevant news articles or links that provide the latest news for the evening.
Click on a relevant news link to view more detailed information.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Scroll down to check if there are relevant news articles or links that provide the latest news for the evening.
